nodes.bodyText: Please rebase your branch on the lastest master. We should not see any changes that you did not personally make. I would review your commit before pushing to the server.
xdoc examples and config should be surrounded by source tag and not div and pre.
javadoc examples should be indented similar to xdoc.
javadoc tags do not need additional indentation.
How is bar valid java code? All examples should be valid code as that is what users will understand and connect to.

beforeCommit.message: Issue #7705: add no error regression for contribution repo

nodes.bodyText: Please swap examples so violation comes first and then OK. This makes the examples look like "This is how to resolve an issue".

This is a complex check since we check alot of different scenarios and some things are allowed while others are not.
Right now you only have basically 1 example per config. Can you expand examples more. What about ifs with no else, try/catch, methods, classes, etc...
add brief comment why it is violation.
please add brief comment on why violation is here, please do same for other cases.

afterCommit.message:
dependency: bump org.eclipse.jgit

Bumps org.eclipse.jgit from 5.6.1.202002131546-r to 5.7.0.202003090808-r.

Signed-off-by: dependabot-preview[bot] <support@dependabot.com>

nodes.bodyText:
Correct wording:
 as as the 'else' keyword
statement is not allowed on same line  after curly right brace

right curly must be on same line as 'catch' keyword
Please apply the same pattern to other similar cases

violation comment should be on the same line where it is reported, desctiption comment can be on other line.
*    if (foo) { bar(); } int i = 0;  // violation
*                  // ^^^ statement is not allowed on same line after curly right brace
// violation, right curly must be alone on line
